info.title: Lukhas OpenAI Facade
info.description: OpenAI-compatible API powered by LUKHAS MATRIZ cognitive engine

get.description:
List all indexes with metadata.

Returns:
    IndexListResponse with list of all indexes

post.description:
Create a new embedding index.

Args:
    payload: Index creation request

Returns:
    IndexResponse with created index metadata

Raises:
    HTTPException: 400 if index name already exists

get.description:
Get index details by ID.

Args:
    index_id: Index identifier

Returns:
    IndexResponse with index metadata

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if index not found

delete.description:
Delete an entire index.

Args:
    index_id: Index identifier

Returns:
    IndexDeleteResponse with deletion status

post.description:
Add vectors to an index.

Args:
    index_id: Index identifier
    payload: Vector addition request

Returns:
    VectorAddResponse with add statistics

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if index not found
    HTTPException: 400 if dimension mismatch

Search for nearest neighbors in an index.

Args:
    index_id: Index identifier
    payload: Search request with query vector

Returns:
    VectorSearchResponse with nearest neighbors

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if index not found
    HTTPException: 400 if query vector dimension mismatch

delete.description:
Delete a vector from an index.

Args:
    index_id: Index identifier
    vector_id: Vector identifier to delete

Returns:
    VectorDeleteResponse with deletion status

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if index not found

get.description: Liveness probe - is the service running?
Readiness probe - can the service handle requests?

post.description: Generate AI responses using MATRIZ orchestrator.

trees.title: Trees
trees.description: Number of trees for Annoy index (more trees = better accuracy, slower build)

dimension.title: Dimension
dimension.description: Vector dimension (auto-detected on first add if not specified)

IndexCreateRequest.title: IndexCreateRequest
IndexCreateRequest.description: Request to create a new index.

VectorAddRequest.title: VectorAddRequest
VectorAddRequest.description: Request to add vectors to an index.

failed_count.title: Failed Count
failed_count.description: Number of vectors that failed to add

k.title: K
k.description: Number of nearest neighbors to return

VectorSearchRequest.title: VectorSearchRequest
VectorSearchRequest.description: Request to search for nearest neighbors.

X-Trace-Id.description: W3C trace context ID (32-char hex) for request correlation

X-Service-Version.description: Deployment version (git SHA or version string)

X-RateLimit-Limit.description: Max requests allowed in the current window

X-RateLimit-Remaining.description: Requests remaining in the current window

X-RateLimit-Reset.description: Epoch seconds until the current window resets

X-RateLimit-Limit-Requests.description: Maximum requests allowed in the current window (legacy)

X-RateLimit-Remaining-Requests.description: Remaining requests in the current window (legacy)

X-RateLimit-Reset-Requests.description: Seconds until the rate limit window resets (legacy)

Retry-After.description: Seconds to wait before retrying (429 responses only)
